description.brief: pose_follower_3d - an extended pose_follower local planner which performs collision checks in 3D

package.description: This package provides an extended pose_follwer to perform 3D collision checks against the robot's full kinematic configuration. It should serve as a drop-in replacement as local planner in the navigation stack, to be used with global plans from sbpl_lattice_planner_3d. The 3D collision map is usually sent out from octomap_server.
package.author: Eitan Marder-Eppstein, Armin Hornung
